name: Free
description: Your essential toolkit for job hunting. Access diverse job listings and apply seamlessly.
features: Limited to 5 active job listings at a time

name: Standard
description: Relevant for multiple users, extended & premium support.
features: Up to 20 active job listings at a time
Access job listings and apply easily.
Enhanced company profile visibility with logo and branding
Advanced application tracking with filtering and sorting options

name: Premium
description: Best for large scale uses and extended redistribution rights.
